message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will greatly benefit you. I'm initially offering it at $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While your offer is appreciated, $1,200,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to let it go for $1,750,000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
